venue.name: The Alchemy Juice Bar & Growing Green Co-op

item.description:
What exactly is a GMO and how is it affecting our food supply? This evening will be an informational night to find out the latest update and research about GM foods, how they are affecting our health and action steps on what we can do about it!

Meeting will start at 7PM but please feel free to get there between 6-7 have an organic meal @ Alchemy and meet new people passionate about the same issues you are!

Connecticut currently has a Bill HB 5117, that if passed will mandate companies to label GMO foods in CT. Please help your state be the first in the nation to have a labeling law regarding GMO foods that will set a world-wide precedent! If you ever dreamt of making a difference - now is your time!
item.name: GMO Info Night
